parameter.name: serialPort
parameter.label: Serial Port
parameter.description: Serial port to use for connecting to the Rotel device

parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: Host name or IP address of the Rotel device (IP connection) or the machine connected to the Rotel device (serial over IP)

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Communication port (IP or serial over IP). For IP connection to the Rotel device, keep the default port 9590

parameter.name: protocol
parameter.label: Protocol Version
parameter.description: Choose one of the two protocol versions (depends on your device firmware)
